named-query.name: findGebruikerById
named-query.query: select g from Gebruiker g where g.id = :id

named-query.name: findGebruikerByEmailAdres
named-query.query: select g from Gebruiker g where g.emailAdres = :emailAdres

named-query.name: findKarakterById
named-query.query: select k from Karakter k where k.karakterId = :id

named-query.name: findItemsByEigenaar
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.eigenaar = :eigenaar

named-query.name: findItemsByPositie
named-query.query: select i from Item i where i.positie = :positie
